name: Fruits Make Sense?
description:
Theme: It's not supposed to do that, Makes total sense

Controls

W, A, S, D (or)⬆⬇➡⬅ arrow keys to move the player.

Left mouse button(LMB) to Interact.

Objective:

You are stuck in a maze and you have to get out of it by diving into lava  Collect the apples and reach the door. It makes total sense.

Credits

Programmer:

  • Chanukya mahidar
  • Pannendra Ommina

Designers;

  • Gaurav Barai
  • Sriram Yashwanth

Artist:
